module.name: bridgeconnector
module.description: Install eMagicOne Bridge Connector module to fluently connect Store Manager desktop application to PrestaShop database and connect to Mobile Assistant app installed on your mobile device. Increase speed of data management, take advantage of simplicity and reliability with all-in-one Store Manager and have access to the real-time store data reports at your fingertips from your Android device wherever you are.
module.author: eMagicOne
